data.title: Hedy AI Introduces Topic Insights, Industry's First Cross-Session Meeting Intelligence Technology
data.description: New capability analyzes conversation patterns across multiple related meetings, solving the continuity problem that existing meeting AI platforms haven't addressedPortland, OR, Nov. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hedy AI, the AI-powered meeting coach, today announced Topic Insights, a breakthrough feature that represents the industry's first solution for analyzing patterns across multiple related conversations. While existing meeting intelligence platforms treat each conversations in isolation, To
